title: Jungle nasus glass cannon FUN 330+ stacks @ 20 minutes
body:
http://www.mobafire.com/league-of-legends/build/409506

Fun way to play nasus. Glass cannon, backdoorer.

give it a try.

replies.body:
Nope, in a real game, the enemy jungler will start gank from lvl 2 and if you die once during lane phase you are set back so far behind. Not only that nasus will be missing out on lots of farm. I mean i always kayle top and the enemy nasus rage quit lvl 2.

This is why nasus should jungle. Even in ranked, people expect nasus to top, but when they counterpick, you counterpick them back which always results in a top lane win. They have no idea which lane nasus is going.
400 Stacks by 20 mins is Standard. Any Less and you need to work on your stack game.

link doesnt work for me.

also. jungle nasus is ill advised. glass cannon nasus also.

but a half decent build would be gunblade BT sunfire visage with juggernaut jungle item and first damage item sheen into a last item triforce.

try the link again. My build is fun because I don't get zoned and i pick my fights.

Normally nasus get zoned when going full tank, and team mates don't even take advantage of the fact you just got poked by 5 champions.

Might as well use alistar.

Team mates never read your movements and intentions. This is why I play objective - crush towers and get rich fast. Tank nasus means you are slow lane pushing while enemies can farm all day.
LOL I've seen jungle Nasus build tank and come out of jungle with 500 stacks at 20 minutes try harder.
